creator: ian_bruce@fastmail.fm
text:
In this document:

http://httpd.apache.org/docs/1.3/misc/FAQ.html

section H2 contains some links to an article in English and German
about URL rewriting. Both links are now 404. The correct URLS are:

http://www.heise.de/ix/artikel/1996/12/149/     (German)
http://www.heise.de/ix/artikel/E/1996/12/149/   (English)

also, section H1 links to another article by the same author.
The link now gets a redirect back to the Apache website:

http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.0/misc/rewriteguide.html

This should be updated in case the other server goes away.
